markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cunning Climber](/Feats.aspx?ID=1019) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Halfling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=87" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 45 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Whether you are climbing a ship's rigging, a jungle tree, or a clock tower, you have an uncanny knack for finding footholds and handholds where larger creatures can't. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet.
name: Cunning Climber
